title: Where can I find a free background score without any copyright issues? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many sites like Pond5 that sell very cheap music, footage, etc. Also some free sites but you need to do your own searches. Be careful when you see ‘royalty free’. It doesn’t mean totally free, just that you don’t have to make payments whenever it’s shown. You may find some music under Creative Commons search. These are usually material the author has released without expecting payment. Just read any terms carefully so you know what you’re getting and what are your obligations.
